document_compliance.amendment_title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Food Products Standards and Food Additives) Amendment Regulations, 2025

Net weight, best‑before date, and storage instructions are present
evidence: "100% Arabica Coffee Beans" – indicates no additives (Product Label)

document_compliance.amendment_title: Draft Food Safety and Standards (Vegan Foods) Amendment Regulations, 2025
current_practices: No explicit vegan claim on the coffee label
Healthy Bites contains milk and gluten, thus not vegan
evidence: "100% Arabica Coffee Beans" – indicates vegan potential but no claim (Product Label)
"Allergens: Contains gluten and milk" – indicates non‑vegan status (Lab Test Report)
gaps: Missing "Vegan" claim on products that are vegan
No verification that all ingredients are free from animal derivatives
actions: Identify all products that qualify as vegan
Add a clear "Vegan" claim on the front‑of‑pack label for those products
Update ingredient list to confirm absence of animal derivatives
Conduct a lab test for vegan status if required by the amendment
Obtain sign‑off from the Compliance Officer and update the label design
File updated labels with the relevant regulatory authority
